Topic.Title: My game Texture and textadventures.co.uk on Jenna & Julien Podcast

Posts.EditableText:
Just to let you know, I was notified that a playthrough of my game Texture (and the textadventures.co.uk website) was the topic of the very popular Jenna & Julien Podcast on March 11. Check out  #224 - Choose Your Own Story PT.2 here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yLt41bjQUuw
